body_html: Unfortunately it's not trivial to change these names, because some code might have used them in explicit named arguments. I agree it would be nicer to have them consistent, so perhaps we could consider a breaking change at some point in the future.
body_text: Unfortunately it's not trivial to change these names, because some code might have used them in explicit named arguments. I agree it would be nicer to have them consistent, so perhaps we could consider a breaking change at some point in the future.
body: Unfortunately it's not trivial to change these names, because some code might have used them in explicit named arguments. I agree it would be nicer to have them consistent, so perhaps we could consider a breaking change at some point in the future.
